title: When are the free mystery skins going to arrive?
body: I purchased 6 mystery skins on August 8th and was just curious as to when my free one will arrive? Would it show up in purchase history? Last time with the free champ I got Nami and she appeared in my roster but I did not receive the chest until 3 days later so I was very confused. This isn't a champ it's a skin though so it will be difficult to tell what I got this time haha XD? Are they already distributed so should I search all my champs, or will it take a bit longer?

replies.body:
They said within a week of the event ending. The event ended monday, so riot has until sunday to gift them out. 
For the pool party it was like three days after the event ended.
Yup! Distribution takes a bit to complete, and like you said, it'll be within a week of the event ending on the 10th! :]
